title: In-Depth Social Studies Learning Process Utilizing Adaptive E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of social studies at the secondary education level and experience with digital learning environments
context.additional_context: Learners participate flexibly in learning using personal devices, with an emphasis on analyzing social issues and project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners achieve at least 80% mastery of advanced social studies content tailored to their proficiency level in an IMS LD-based adaptive learning environment
Learners complete 90% or more of weekly learning objectives through personalized learning pathways generated from pre-diagnostic results
Learners adjust learning activities based on real-time feedback from a runtime adaptive system and score 85 points or higher in final assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
